about_the_game:
Overview

Jhon Digwood is a 2D single-player action platformer with guns, grenades, and a bit of blood. The game requires players to complete various missions. After each mission is completed or failed the player will continue to the next mission while a recording of the player's previous mission gets added to the level. The game continues until the player fails a mission and is out of available tries.

Features

  • 6 different areas each with its distinct style and mechanics

  • Pixel art style reminiscent of early Flash games

  • Customization options for cosmetics and gameplay

  • An original soundtrack

  • As many missions as we can put into this thing

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050

short_description: Jhon Digwood is a game about consequences. Play multiple rounds completing tasks to obtain a high score, from finding treasure to killing brethren. Each completed mission records your movements and creates a clone replaying them. More clones are added until you can't manage without getting shot.
